product_name: Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 4 Tent
long_description: With a trail weight of 5 lbs. 15 oz., the updated Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 4 tent lets you and 3 friends enjoy a light load and plenty of living space on your 3-season backpacking adventures.
short_description: With a trail weight of 5 lbs. 15 oz., the updated Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 4 tent lets you and 3 friends enjoy a light load and plenty of living space on your 3-season backpacking adventures.
